attributes.action: Immediately HALT the erection of too many traffic information signs on the M4 and other motorways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request an enquiry by the Transport Committee for justification on the erection of 48 massive traffic billboards on the 22 mile stretch of the M4 between Junctions 16 & 18. That is 1 for every 0.916 miles in either direction. Is this wasteful, pointless signage being repeated elsewhere. How much is it costing and why do we have to be more frugal, pay more road tax and fuel duty for the Ministry to spend it all on repetitive unsightly hoardings displaying a motoring message that motorists can't leave or do anything about. Are they intending to show films for in-car entertainment. Did the Minister approve this madness. What is the Carbon footprint of this insane project.
